Our client is a listed international fast fashion retailer that is continuing to expand across Asia. To cope with business needs, management is looking for a Senior Store Creative & Architectural Manager to lead the Asia Pacific store visual localisation project.


About the Role

Reporting to the Senior Retail Director of APAC, your mission will be to uplift the customer journey through adapting and enhancing the creative visual concept of existing doors in accordance to the geographical location it is based in. You will be in charge of the creative & decorative aspect of stores (interior store display) while working coherently with Visual Merchandising team (Product Display), and Store Project teams to ensure the overall visual results are enhanced while retaining the brand’s original DNA.

Our client will be expecting the Senior Store Development Manager to bring in a new visually impactful shopping experience for its shoppers in Asia. You will be responsible for the store visual concept, store layout design, fixture design, production, delivery and installation.

Architecture / Interior Design / Engineering degree holder with a proven track record of success with any sizeable retail MNCs
Minimal of 7 years relevant working experience with at least 2 years at a managerial level
